For those with cardiovascular health being good (B=1), the probability of blood pressure levels being normal (C=1) is 0.7663. 
For those with cardiovascular health being poor (B=0), the probability of risk of heart disease being low (D=1) is 0.4122. 
For those with cardiovascular health being good (B=1), the probability of risk of heart disease being low (D=1) is 0.8370.
